messages.title: Dear constituent
messages.content: Hertsmere is my home patch. I grew up around Radlett. My Dad worked in a wire factory in Watford, and my Mum still works at Boots in London Colney. I went to Parmiter's School and won a place to study law at Cambridge University. I live locally with my wife and two children. My experiences have taught me the value of hard work. I believe in providing for yourself, your family and serving your community and country. We are fortunate to have the best of both worlds here in Hertsmere - beautiful countryside, distinct towns and villages, a strong sense of community, but relatively easy access to London. As Hertsmere's MP for the past four years, I have sought to preserve and enhance this. I have used my skills and experiences to give you a strong voice nationally and stand up for your interests. It would be an honour to be re-elected and have the opportunity to serve you again as your MP.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting our schools, NHS and police

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election will be close. Your local vote will decide it.

issues.economy: $3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school
issues.health: $33.9 billion extra for the NHS, 40 new hospitals across the country

community.content: Local voice for our community, delivering for you in Hertsmere

contactInformation.address: Billie Bowbrick, 27 Park Road, RADLETT WD7 8EG
